name: appearance
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: appearance
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an occasion when someone appears in public

example.eg: It was his first appearance on television/television appearance as president.
example.egtrans: 这是他就任总统以来首次在电视上亮相。

example.eg: She will be making a public appearance, signing copies of her latest novel.
example.egtrans: 她将公开亮相，为自己刚刚出版的小说签名售书。

trans_examp.trans_en: an occasion when someone goes to court to be officially involved in a trial

example.eg: This was the defendant's third court appearance for the same offence.
example.egtrans: 这是被告因为同一桩罪行第三次出庭受审。

trans_examp.trans_en: a public performance by an entertainer

example.eg: He made his first stage/TV appearance at the age of six.
example.egtrans: 在6岁时他首次登台演出／在电视上亮相。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to be present somewhere for a short time
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 露一下面；到场稍作停留

example.eg: I didn't really want to go to the party, but I thought I'd better put in an appearance.
example.egtrans: 我真不想参加这个聚会，但是我想还是露个面的好。

dsense.name: appearance
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the way a person or thing looks to other people

example.eg: a middle-aged man of smart appearance
example.egtrans: 一个外表整洁的中年男子

example.eg: You can alter/change the whole appearance of a room just by lighting it in a certain way.
example.egtrans: 只要在灯光上做些文章，整个房间面貌就会焕然一新。

example.eg: There was nothing unusual about/in her physical appearance.
example.egtrans: 她的外表并没有什么特别之处。

example.eg: The large car outside the house gave the appearance of wealth (= suggested wealthy people lived there).
example.egtrans: 住宅外面停的那辆大轿车显示出主人很富有。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: what things look like or seem to be rather than what they actually are

example.eg: He was a far more complicated man than outward appearances suggested.
example.egtrans: 他这个人实际上很难懂，与其外表相去甚远。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: judging from what can be seen

example.eg: To all appearances their marriage is fine, but I think she gives him a bad time in private.
example.egtrans: 从表面看他们的婚姻很美满，但我觉得在私下里她不会给他好日子过。
